nodes.text: Fett Code was a language spoken by the Mandalorian bounty hunter Jango Fett and his clone son Boba Fett. When the Jedi Knight Obi-Wan Kenobi visited the pair in their suite in Tipoca City on the planet Kamino in 22 BBY, Jango spoke to Boba in Fett Code while conversing with Kenobi, after which Boba quickly shut the door to a room containing Jango's Mandalorian armor.

Fett Code first appeared in the 2002 prequel trilogy film, Star Wars Episode II Attack of the Clones. It was first identified by name in the video "Every Language in Star Wars" which was released in 2019 on the Star Wars Kids YouTube channel.
